## Board 1

```{r}
board <- list()
board$dim <- 4
board$ladders <- data.frame(ladder.starts = c(3,5),ladder.ends = c(10,12))
board$snakes <- data.frame(snakes.starts = c(11,15), snakes.ends = c(4,8))
board
```

```{r}
plays <- c()
for(i in 1:1000){
  plays <- c(plays,play(board))
}
```

```{r}
hist(plays)
mean(plays)
boxplot(plays)
```
